parameter.name: partyId
parameter.description: ID of the person or organisation.

parameter.name: trackId
parameter.description: Track ID for track to the new opportunity as it is being created.

parameter.name: currency
parameter.description: Character ISO currency code for the opportunity.

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: The expected value of the opportunity in the specified currency.

parameter.name: durationBasis
parameter.description: One of the following option for opportunities that repeat for a period of time HOUR, DAY, WEEK, MONTH, QUARTER, YEAR.

parameter.name: duration
parameter.description: Number of time the durationBasis is repeated for the opportunity.

parameter.name: expectedCloseDate
parameter.description: Date the opportunity is expected to complete.

parameter.name: actualCloseDate
parameter.description: Date the opportunity is actually close.

parameter.name: owner
parameter.description: The authenticated username to create opportunity.
